content: lion brand pattern # cwe-princess skill level intermediate level 3 size one size approx 41 x 47 including border each square measures approx 6 x 6 620-301 wool-ease yarn white/multi 8 balls crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm make 42 spanish squares sew squares together to form rectangle 6 squares wide by 7 squares tall crochet 5-round border to finish
